entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
